title: The Design Doc - an Asynchronous Alternative to the Whiteboard
synopsis: Over the past couple of years I've found that using a specific structure when writing design docs is one of the most effective ways of planning software architectures and implementations.

title: Cooking by Month - an Efficient Way to Expand your Culinary Horizons
synopsis: Recently, I have been trying to bridge the gap between delicious foods I can eat and delicious foods I can make.
